|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;; |flash1size = <!-- Size of flash --> |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = SK hynix;HY5DU121622DTP-D43; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = IC+;IP100A;IP100A LF, 06411S15, FFM3511.1; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 03/25/2008 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 790069288975 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B001193F1K |asin_country = US |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan

|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Cameo WLN-1310 |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Marvell;88W8363; |rad1chip2 = Marvell;; |rad1chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "Digital Media Adaptor Main Board" and "REV-A1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :"Digital Media Adapter USB Board", "REV-A1", and "8SM750U..2A1G" is silkscreened on the USB board.
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:D-Link DSM-750 01.jpg| File:D-Link DSM-750 02.jpg| File:D-Link DSM-750 03.jpg| File:D-Link DSM-750 04.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
==Notes== ===Probable used PSU(s)=== This device has an internal power supply - the one shown in the FCC photos is a UOP325D-0512(S) ('''UNIFIVE''' manuf'ed?). It's a dual-output power supply (5V, 12V).
There isn't a modular power connector on the case itself - it's corded.
{{hasPowerSupply |brand = UNIFIVE |model = UOP325D-0512(S) |input_v=120 |input_a= |input_c=AC |input_hz= |input_conn=unknown |output_v= |output_a= |output_c=DC |output_conn=unknown |style=modular, internal |countrymanuf = }}
